nodes.text: Themog was a criminal operating in the town of Corestrike on the planet Chrona. A former Corellian Security Force officer, Themog retired in disgrace after being injured while trying to shake down a suspect for a higher bribe to look the other way.

Settling on Chrona, Themog was associated with a lot of the crime that plague the town of Corestrike. He retained the assassin droid BG-12, and was in a romantic relationship with Lady Moira Kruger. Their relationship allowed him to hide out at the Grinder Dance Hall, and to corrupt her vote on the Magistrate Council.
